mapper.select: select ub.* ,ui.nickname from user_buy ub left join user_info ui on(ub.uid=ui.uid) where ub.uid!=#{uid} and state ='0' limit #{pages},6
select count(0) from user_buy where state = '1'

select ub.* ,ui.nickname,uh.sell_uid,uh.purchase_uid,uh.purchase_state,uh.sell_state from user_buy ub left join user_info ui on(ub.uid=ui.uid) left join user_buy_history uh on ub.id = uh.user_buy_id where ub.uid=#{uid} and ub.state !='6' and ub.state !='0' and ub.state !='9' or uh.sell_uid=#{uid} and uh.sell_state !='6' and uh.sell_state !='0' and uh.sell_state !='9'
